original_text: In the same way, look at the way people live. Then you will know what they are really like.

sentences.original_text: In the same way, look at the way people live.
sentences.korean_translation: 같은 방식으로, 사람들이 어떻게 사는지 보아라.

sentences.original_text: Then you will know what they are really like.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 그들이 정말 어떤 사람인지 알게 될 것이다.
